title: Bottom of the World (Max Strong Thriller Series Book 2)
features: The second pulse-pounding thriller featuring Max Strong.
Max is a wanted man. Again. Only this time he's innocent. Mostly.

Refusing to be the fall guy, he fled Essex, witness protection, and some sticky questions about dead bodies and a missing suitcase. Now, he's a fugitive just trying to piece together a life in the margins.

Mr. Smith is a man that specializes in discretely taking care of problems. Kate Sanders is a PI that's going broke and trying to get her dead father's voice out of her head. Alexei Yushkin is still alive but walks with a limp and carries a deep grudge. Mike Duffy is a small town reporter in danger of cracking a case too wide open.
Carter is just a psycho. Danny is the idiot that crossed Carter.
They all want to find Max.
After a brutal beating reopens old wounds in Essex, the pressure mounts for Max to stop hiding and come back.
Read the second addictive thriller in the Max Strong series today. Perfect for fans of David Baldacci, Brad Meltzer, Gregg Hurwitz, Wallace Stroby and Ace Atkins.
".. does a great job of building suspense and characters who keep us engaged and interested." Melisa
"Shaking the Tree is a dynamic, page turning thriller." Lauren
" ...an exciting and well developed story from a new author." William
"... the wide ranging story lines comes together to form an impressive thriller." Robert S.
description: *** For a free starter library of 2 books, visit mikedonohuebooks.com ***

Mike Donohue writes crime fiction, suspense, and thriller novels.The Max Strong series is about a reformed thief and criminal trying to put a lot of tragedy and blood behind him and live a quiet life. It doesn't go so well and Max needs to figure out if he can really leave his past behind and get free. Or, if he needs to embrace it and maybe destroy whatever is left of himself.Mike lives outside Boston with his wife, 2 kids and Dashiell Hammett.Dash is his dog.Connect with me at my website, or on twitter, facebook, or goodreads for news and updates. Thanks for the reviews!
Acclaim for Mike Donohue and Max Strong
"Plenty of twists and turns to keep you engaged and racing towards the last page to see how it ends."
"Great characters and a story with several unusual twists."
"Mike Donohue does a great job of building suspense and characters who keepus engaged and interested. I can't wait for his next novel."
"...very well written and very good character development."
"Catches interest right from first page. Read right thru from first page to last and wanted to read more. Interesting twists."
"You can feel the tension build as the story progresses and the wide ranging story lines comes together to form an impressive thriller."
